interpretation.p: Approximate dates described in terms of centuries or partial centuries have been interpreted as documented in Syriaca.org Dates.

category.catDesc: The name used by Syriaca.org for document titles, citation, and disambiguation. These names have been created according to the Syriac.org guidelines for headwords: http://syriaca.org/documentation/headwords.html.
An anglicized version of a name, included to facilitate searching.
Indicates the content is canonical, i.e., widely agreed upon. Abbreviations of work titles are primarily in view.

langUsage.language: Unvocalized Syriac of any variety or period
Names or terms Romanized into English according to the standards adopted by the Gorgias Encyclopedic Dictionary of the Syriac Heritage

bibl.title: Galatians (Peshitta Version)
ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܦܘܠܘܣ ܕܠܘܬ ܓܠܛܝ̈ܐ
ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܠܘܬ ܓܠܛܝ̈ܐ
Gal
Galatians
ܐܶܓܰܪܬܳܐ ܕܦܰܘܠܳܘܣ ܕܰܠܘܳܬ ܓܰܠܰܛܳܝ̈̈̈̈ܶ̈ܐ
ܫܠ̣ܡܬ ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܠܘܬ ܓ̈ܠܛܝܐ ܕܐܬ݂ܟܬܒܬ ܡܢ ܪܗܘܡܐ ܘܐܫ̣ܬܕܪܬ ܒܝܕ ܛܝܡܬܐܘܣ. ܕܐܝܬ ܒܗ̇ ܦܬ̈ܓܡܐ ܐܪܒܥܡܐܐ̣ ܘܬܡܢܝܐ.
The Epistle of Galatians, according to the Peshitta version
ܫܠܡܬ܀ ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܠܘܬ܀ ܓܠܛ̈ܝܐ ܕܐܬܟܬܒܬ܀ ܡܢ. ܪܗܘܡܐ. ܘܗܘܝܐ. ܫܒܥܡܐܐ. ܘܐܪܒܥܝܢ. ܘܫܬܐ܀ ܦܬܓ̈ܡܝܢ: .
Galatians, according to the Peshitta version
The Epistle of Galatians
bibl.note: ܦܿܘܠܘܣ ܫܠܝܚܐ܂ ܠܐ ܡܢ ܒܿܢܝܢܫܐ̈܂ ܘܠܐ ܒܿܝܕܼ ܒܿܪܢܫܐ ܐܠܐ ܒܿܝܕܼ ܝܫܘܼܥ ܡܫܝܚܐ܂ ܘܐܠܗܐ ܐܒܼܘܼܗ̱ܝ܂ ܗܘ ܕܿܐܩܝܡܗ ܡܢ ܒܿܝܬܼ ܡܝܬܼܐ̈܂

bibl.title: ܟܬܒܐ ܩܕܝ̈ܫܐ: ܟܬܒܐ ܕܕܝܬܩܐ ܥܛܝܼܩܬܐ ܘ ܚ̇ܕܬܐ
The Syriac Peshiṭta Bible with English Translation: Galatians–Philemon
Surath Kthob
Comprehensive Aramaic Lexicon
ܟܬܵܒܸ̈ܐ ܩܲܕܹ̈ܝܫܸܐ ܗ̅ ܟܬܵܒܸ̈ܐ ܕܕܹܝܲܬܹܝܩܹܐ ܥܲܛܹܝܩܵܐ ܘܚܕܲܬܵܐ
The SBL Handbook of Style: For Biblical Studies and Related Disciplines
